channel.title: Steam Error
channel.description: Hey, Im new to the forum and want to ask, whats wrong with steam? I keep getting Steam.exe(main exception):CmultiFieldBlob(pSerialized). I cant access steam at all. Help please?

item.title: Steam Error
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
clientregistry.blob solves so many steam problems
.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Error

item.description:
Ok, thanks its working now.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Error
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Try deleting ClientRegistry.blob from your Steam directory (Typically located in C:\program files\steam) then reopen Steam. Should work. All your games will have the default settings (names, sprays, and whatnot) but you can change them back.

See if that helps.

(Also, Google is your friend.)

Read full topic
